item.title: 墨西哥集团在铜关税缩减后评估美国投资
item.description: 在华盛顿准备对部分铜产品征收关税之际，墨西哥大型铜生产商墨西哥集团（Grupo Mexico）的一位高管在周三的一次电话会议上表示，该集团希望在未来三到五年内决定在美国的项目投资。【原文：Grupo Mexico, a major copper producer, is looking to decide on investments for projects in the United States within the next three to five years, an executive said on a call on Wednesday, as Washington prepares to levy tariffs on some copper products.】

item.title: Albemarle 第二季度利润出人意料
item.description: 本周三，全球最大的充电电池用锂生产商 Albemarle 公司公布，受金属需求上升的帮助，该公司第二季度意外盈利。【原文：Albemarle , the world's largest producer of lithium for rechargeable batteries, posted a surprise second-quarter profit on Wednesday, helped by rising demand for the metal.】

item.title: 美高梅国际酒店集团（MGM Resorts）季度收入因体育博彩业的强势而增长
item.description: 赌场运营商美高梅国际酒店集团（MGM Resorts International）周三公布，受在线体育博彩业务和中国业务表现强劲的推动，第二季度收入有所增长。【原文：Casino operator MGM Resorts International on Wednesday reported a rise in second-quarter revenue, driven by strong performance in its online sports-betting operations as well as its China unit.】

item.title: 翻新商品需求稳定，EBay 季度收入高于预期
item.description: 电子商务公司 eBay 周三预计第三季度营收将高于华尔街预期，这表明市场对收藏品和翻新商品等产品的需求强劲，使其股价在盘后交易中上涨了 7%。【原文：E-commerce firm eBay forecast third-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, signaling robust demand for products like collector's items and refurbished goods, sending its shares up 7% in extended trading.】

item.title: Meta 为推动 "超级智能 "缩小年度资本支出预期，股价大涨
item.description: 受社交媒体巨头在激烈的人工智能竞赛中高风险推动 "超级智能 "的影响，Meta Platforms 周三收窄了年度资本支出预期，股价在盘后交易中上涨近 9%。【原文：Meta Platforms narrowed its annual capital expenditures forecast on Wednesday, driven by the social media giant's high-stakes push for "superintelligence" in the heated AI race, sending its shares up nearly 9% in extended trading.】

item.title: 福特上调预计关税对业绩的影响，下调年度指导目标
item.description: 福特汽车公司周三表示，关税对其第二季度业绩造成了 8 亿美元的冲击，但由于福特在美国国内拥有强大的制造基地，因此受到的影响没有一些美国竞争对手那么明显。【原文：Ford Motor said on Wednesday its second-quarter results took an $800 million hit from tariffs, a less pronounced impact than some of its U.S. rivals thanks to Ford's strong domestic manufacturing base.】

item.title: 芯片技术提供商 Arm 谋求自主设计处理器的重大转变
item.description: Arm Holdings 首席执行官雷内-哈斯（Rene Haas）周三表示，Arm Holdings 正在投资开发自己的芯片，这标志着其向其他公司授权蓝图的模式发生了重大转变。【原文：Arm Holdings is investing in developing its own chips, CEO Rene Haas said on Wednesday, marking a major shift to its model of licensing its blueprints to other companies.】

item.title: 人工智能支出取得成效，微软Azure云收入激增
item.description: 本周三，微软公司的 Azure 云计算业务又实现了一个季度的大幅增长，营收超过了华尔街的预期，并展示了其在人工智能方面的巨大赌注所带来的不断增长的回报。【原文：Microsoft's Azure cloud-computing business delivered another quarter of blockbuster growth on Wednesday, powering revenue above Wall Street's expectations and showcasing the growing returns on its massive artificial intelligence bets.】

item.title: 高通公司预测营收高于预期，押注人工智能应用推动芯片需求增长
item.description: 高通公司（Qualcomm）周三预计本季度销售额将高于华尔街预期，尽管全球贸易不确定性持续存在，但该公司仍在赌消费终端中不断增长的人工智能功能将促进对其半导体的需求。【原文：Qualcomm projected current-quarter sales above Wall Street expectations on Wednesday, wagering that growing AI capabilities in consumer devices will boost demand for its semiconductors despite ongoing global trade uncertainties.】

item.title: 消息人士称，华纳兄弟发现公司将裁员 10%的电影部门人员
item.description: 一位知情人士周三透露，作为公司一分为二之前重组的一部分，华纳兄弟发现公司将裁员约 10%。【原文：Warner Bros Discovery will lay off roughly 10% of its motion picture group employees as part of a restructuring before the company splits in two, a source with knowledge of the matter said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 游说团体称，关税的不确定性导致巴西输美石油运输中断
item.description: 石油游说集团IBP总裁罗伯托-阿登吉（Roberto Ardenghy）周三告诉路透社，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普宣布对南美国家征收50%的关税后，在巴西运营的能源公司暂停了对美国的石油运输。【原文：Energy companies operating in Brazil suspended oil shipments to the United States after President Donald Trump announced 50% tariffs against the South American country, Roberto Ardenghy, president of oil lobby group IBP, told Reuters on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美联储鲍威尔称尚未决定 9 月降息
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）周三表示，现在就断言央行是否会像金融市场预期的那样在9月份下调利率目标还为时过早。【原文：Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell said Wednesday it's too soon to say whether the central bank will cut its interest rate target in September, as financial markets expect.】

item.title: Verisk 以 24 亿美元收购 AccuLynx，扩大住宅保险业务范围
item.description: 数据分析公司 Verisk 周三表示，将以 23.5 亿美元的价格收购 AccuLynx 公司，后者主要为屋顶承包商提供软件，Verisk 希望借此在住宅保险市场的一个关键领域占据更大的市场份额。【原文：Data analytics firm Verisk said on Wednesday it will buy AccuLynx, which makes software for roofing contractors, for $2.35 billion as it looks for a bigger foothold in a key segment of the residential insurance market.】

item.title: VIEW FOMC 保持利率稳定，但两名反对者希望降息
item.description: 美联储周三在一次意见分歧的决定中维持利率稳定，几乎没有表明何时可能降低借贷成本，并招致美国中央银行两位行长的反对，这两位行长都是唐纳德-特朗普总统任命的，他们都同意特朗普总统的观点，即货币政策过于紧缩。【原文：The Federal Reserve held interest rates steady on Wednesday in a split decision that gave little indication of when borrowing costs might be lowered and drew dissents from two of the U.S. central bank's governors, both appointees of President Donald Trump who agree with him that monetary policy is too tight.】

item.title: 美联储在两次反对声中维持利率不变，美国收益率继续走高
item.description: 在为期两天的政策会议结束后，美国联邦储备委员会决定维持利率稳定，但有两位理事投了反对票，为三十多年来最多。【原文：U.S. Treasury yields pared their increase on Wednesday after the to hold interest rates steady at the end of a two-day policy meeting, but saw two dissenting votes by governors, the most in more than three decades.】

item.title: 白宫：特朗普对进口铜征收 50%的关税
item.description: 白宫表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周三签署了一项公告，以国家安全为由，下令对某些进口铜征收 50%的关税。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Wednesday signed a proclamation ordering 50% tariffs on certain copper imports, citing national security, the White House said.】

item.title: 雷诺新任首席执行官普罗沃斯特面临的主要问题是什么？
item.description: 即将上任的雷诺首席执行官弗朗索瓦-普罗沃斯特（Francois Provost）将掌舵这家法国汽车制造商，而此时雷诺最近的成功正开始出现裂痕，由于销售量疲软，雷诺在本月早些时候下调了全年利润预期。【原文：Incoming Renault CEO Francois Provost will take the helm of the French automaker at a time when it is beginning to show cracks in its recent success, revising down its full year profit forecast earlier this month due to weaker sales volumes.】

item.title: 美国在关键气候调查结果上的逆转给企业带来不确定性
item.description: 据律师和贸易团体称，特朗普政府将其取消美国气候法规的计划称为削减工业成本的一种方式，但这可能会适得其反，迫使汽车制造商、公用事业公司和制造商陷入监管不确定性和诉讼风险的未来。【原文：The Trump administration has billed its plan to undo U.S. climate regulation as a way to cut costs for industry, but it may backfire by forcing automakers, utilities, and manufacturers into a future of regulatory uncertainty and litigation risk, according to lawyers and trade groups.】

item.title: 特朗普签署命令终止对全球商业货运的微量豁免
item.description: 美国白宫周三表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普将从8月29日起暂停对低价值商业货运的全球免税微量优惠待遇。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump is suspending global duty-free de minimis treatment for low-value commercial shipments effective August 29, the White House said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美联储政策决定引发 1993 年以来最多理事异议
item.description: 美联储在周三结束为期两天的政策会议后决定维持利率稳定，这是三十多年来美国央行行长们投反对票最多的一次。【原文：The Federal Reserve's decision to hold interest rates steady following the end of a two-day policy meeting on Wednesday generated the largest number of dissenting votes by governors at the U.S. central bank in just over three decades.】

item.title: 白宫：特朗普签署命令，对巴西额外征收 40% 关税
item.description: 白宫周三表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普签署了一项行政命令，对巴西额外征收 40% 的关税，使关税总额达到 50%，理由是特朗普政府不同意巴西最近的政策。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump signed an executive order implementing an additional 40% tariff on Brazil, bringing the total tariff amount to 50%, the White House said on Wednesday, citing Brazil's recent policies that the Trump administration disagrees with.】

item.title: 空客称有 60 架喷气机正在等待发动机，其中包括普惠公司的发动机
item.description: 空中客车公司首席执行官纪尧姆-福里（Guillaume Faury）表示，因发动机交付延迟而仍在等待的已完工机身数量已增至 60 架，除竞争对手 CFM 公司早前出现的问题外，普惠公司也出现了发动机交付延迟的问题。【原文：Airbus CEO Guillaume Faury said the number of completed airframes still waiting for delayed engine deliveries had risen to 60 and that the delays now involved Pratt & Whitney on top of earlier problems with rival CFM .】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，赛峰集团将选择法国而非加拿大和美国进行大型工厂投资
item.description: 法国航空航天集团赛峰集团（Safran）在法国、美国和加拿大进行了选址角逐后，即将决定在法国新建一座耗资4亿欧元的碳制动器工厂。【原文：French aerospace group Safran is nearing a decision to pick France as home for a new 400-million-euro carbon brakes factory following a contest between sites in France, the United States and Canada, two people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 伯恩利为球迷提供虚拟现实座椅
item.description: 英超新升班马伯恩利队正在为球迷提供虚拟现实观赛体验，这意味着他们可以在自己的房间里享受在俱乐部特夫摩尔球场观赛的乐趣。【原文：Newly-promoted Premier League team Burnley are offering their fans a virtual reality viewing experience, meaning they can enjoy being at the club's Turf Moor stadium from their room.】

item.title: 美国财政部保持票据和债券拍卖规模稳定，增加债务回购
item.description: 美国财政部周三表示，预计至少在未来几个季度内不会增加票据和债券的拍卖规模，这与市场预期一致，因为财政部宣布将在 8 月至 2025 年 10 月期间退款 1,250 亿美元。【原文：The U.S. Treasury Department said on Wednesday it does not anticipate increasing auction sizes for notes and bonds for at least the next several quarters, in line with market expectations, as it announced a $125 billion refunding from August to October 2025.】

item.title: 空中客车公司季度利润增长，维持预期
item.description: 欧洲飞机制造商空中客车公司（Airbus）周三公布了高于预期的第二季度利润，国防和直升机部门的业绩提振了该公司的业绩。【原文：European planemaker Airbus on Wednesday posted a higher-than-expected second-quarter profit, boosted by its defence and helicopter units, and maintained full-year forecasts as it aims to reverse a drop in jetliner deliveries.】

item.title: 消息人士称雪佛龙公司获得美国颁发的在委内瑞拉运营的限制性许可证
item.description: 三位接近该决定的消息人士周三表示，雪佛龙公司已获得在受制裁的委内瑞拉开展业务的美国限制性许可，并补充说，石油收益不得以任何方式转给委内瑞拉总统尼古拉斯-马杜罗的政府。【原文：Chevron has been granted a restricted U.S. license to operate in sanctioned Venezuela, three sources close to the decision said on Wednesday, adding that no money from oil proceeds can be transferred in any way to the administration of Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro.】

item.title: 雷诺任命采购总监弗朗索瓦-普罗沃斯特（Francois Provost）为新任首席执行官
item.description: 雷诺周三任命其首席采购官弗朗索瓦-普罗沃斯特（Francois Provost）为首席执行官，选择了一位鲜为人知的公司内部人士来带领这家法国汽车制造商应对日益激烈的竞争和本月初引发利润预警的疲软需求。【原文：Renault named Francois Provost, its chief procurement officer, as CEO on Wednesday, opting for a little-known company insider to steer the French carmaker through growing competition and weak demand that triggered a profit warning earlier this month.】

item.title: 消息人士称，咖啡连锁店黑岩咖啡秘密申请上市
item.description: 据四位熟悉内情的人士透露，黑石咖啡吧已秘密申请在纽约进行首次公开募股，该连锁咖啡馆的估值可能超过 10 亿美元。【原文：Black Rock Coffee Bar has filed confidentially for an initial public offering in New York that could value the cafe chain at more than $1 billion, according to four people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 消息人士称，JD.com 与德国 Ceconomy 的收购谈判已进入最后阶段
item.description: 消息人士周三告诉路透社，德国电子产品零售商 Ceconomy 股东之间关于中国 JD.com 可能收购该公司的谈判已进入最后阶段，有可能在周三晚间宣布。【原文：Talks between the shareholders of German electronics retailer Ceconomy over a potential takeover by China's JD.com are on the home stretch, sources told Reuters on Wednesday, with an announcement possible on Wednesday evening.】
